CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 18, 1962, pg. 1 reads: "ALL-NIGHT GOSPEL SING FOR DRAFTS FUND - Organist John Shelton, one of many musicians who donated their services, is shown not only playing, but letting the spirit move him in singing.
TitMainTitle: John Shelton playing organ and singing in Calvary Baptist Church for Charles "Buggsy" Drafts Fund
